entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
